title: Atta Tarar condoles with senior journalist Mona Khan on her mother’s demise
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 04 (APP): Federal Minister for Information and Broadcasting Attaullah Tarar on Wednesday visited the office of the Independent Urdu to offer condolences to senior journalist Mona Khan on the demise of her mother.
On this occasion, the minister offered Fateha and prayed to the Almighty to grant the departed soul the highest ranks in Jannah.
While sympathizing with the senior journalist, the minister said the demise of her mother was a great tragedy. There is no substitute for a mother in the world, he added.
A mother’s prayers, compassion and love for her children are the most valuable assets, he remarked.
Principal Information Officer Mubashir Hasan was also present on the occasion.
